sections._note: These IDs will be populated by the reorg subagent after creation

databases._note: These IDs will be populated by the database subagent after creation

api.auth: API key via NOTION_TOKEN env var (local MCP server)

review_policy.description: Docs are reviewed 4x daily by alternating models (Opus + Codex)
guidelines: Use native notion_API-* tools â€” NOT curl
Check content against actual system state (docker, systemctl, Linear, git)
Update page content directly â€” don't just report issues
New content should go in the correct section per hierarchy above
Architecture decisions belong in the ADR database (not loose pages)
Research findings belong in the Research Library database
Project status updates belong in the Projects Registry database
